column1: #text=Recently , my kids reminded me that Arbor Day was approaching .
#text=I always wanted to do something in honor of my mom , and why not plant a tree that I could watch grow in our backyard .
#text=The tree would help with the Arbor Day festivities , as well as be a memory tree that is in dedication of my mom .
#text=We went to our local home improvement store in search of the perfect tree for our task .
#text=The kids decided that we should have some sort of fruit tree , and what better tree than an orange tree , because after all we do live in Florida .
#text=Once we got the tree , a worker assisted us in loading the tree onto my truck , and home bound we were .
#text=Once we got home , we decided on a spot for the tree , and began to dig a hole to place the tree into .
#text=We placed the tree in the hole , and then covered back up the hole .
#text=We then watered the tree , and the process of watching the tree grow began .
